com.jme3.audio.android
Interface AndroidAudioRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
AudioRenderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AndroidMediaPlayerAudioRenderer, AndroidOpenALSoftAudioRenderer
public interface AndroidAudioRenderer
extends AudioRenderer

Android specific AudioRenderer interface that supports pausing and resuming audio files when the app is minimized or placed in the background

Method Summary
 void pauseAll()
          Pauses all Playing audio.
 void resumeAll()
          Resumes all Paused audio.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.jme3.audio.AudioRenderer
cleanup, deleteAudioData, deleteFilter, initialize, pauseSource, playSource, playSourceInstance, setEnvironment, setListener, stopSource, update, updateListenerParam, updateSourceParam
 

Method Detail

pauseAll

void pauseAll()
Pauses all Playing audio. To be used when the app is placed in the background.

resumeAll

void resumeAll()
Resumes all Paused audio. To be used when the app is brought back to the foreground.
